sources.title: Marshal of Heldorado (1950)  Shamrock Ellison & Lucky Hayden | Classic Western | Full Movie
sources.description:
WEâ€™LL FIGHT TO THE LAST BANDIT!
Shamrock and Lucky team up to drive the Tulliver Brothers out of Heldorado.

Watch the colorized version: https://youtu.be/uOdeweBhHl8
Director: Thomas Carr
Writers: Ron Ormond, Maurice Tombragel, Jack Natteford
Stars:James Ellison, Russell Hayden, Raymond Hatton, Fuzzy Knight, Julie Adams, Tom Tyler
Genre: Classics, Western
Followed by Crooked River (1950) https://youtu.be/W3DaikgjnrQ

CCC CHAPTERS:

23:43 Razor Tulliver's barber chair
27:41 Shamrock Ellison on the inside

36:38 Colonel has dirty hands, but a clean shave

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: The Tulliver brothers are terrorizing the town of Heldorado, and Shamrock has been sent to round them up. Arriving posing as a dude, he gets two of them early when they shoot each other trying to shoot him. After he finishes off a third brother, the Tullivers bring in reinforcements and rob the bank. With his identity now revealed, Shamrock organizes a posse and they all head out after them.
metadata.Writer: Ron Ormond, Maurice Tombragel, Jack Natteford
metadata.Actors: James Ellison, Russell Hayden, Raymond Hatton
